emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five men and six women, including two toasting in rear, some members of the Las Catena Social Club, including Gloria Talbott, Thelma Owens, Alicia Harrison, and Westina Slaughter, gathered for a New Years celebration around sofa in interior with light colored walls, door with blinds, and large window with blinds and geometrically patterned curtains, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1959, page 8, reads: "For Deserving Family - Las Catena Social Club ushered in the New Year by presenting a basket, filled with groceries, to a deserving family, and then celebrating with their husbands and friends at their annual party. Gloria Talbott is president; Thelma Owens, secretary; Alicia Harrison, treasurer; Westina Slaughter, social chairman, Julie Beatty and Elizabeth Mickens are not shown. - Harris Photo."
